trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.CurrentStepIndex*> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.NextStepIndex*> property for navigation in wizard controls.
The WizardNavigationEventArgs class provides the data needed for the various navigation events in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.

For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control uses the WizardNavigationEventArgs object to indicate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.CurrentStepIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.NextStepIndex%2A> for the control.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs"></xref> class.
The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object that is currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control will display next.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the navigation to the next step in the wizard should be canceled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the navigation to the next step should be canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.

A zero-based index value that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object that is currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.

Gets a value that represents the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control will display next.
A zero-based index value that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control will display next.
